Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and crumble into small pieces.
Peel and dice sweet potato and onion.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown.
Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Add sweet potato and cook for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Cook until sweet potato is tender.
Serve hot, garnished with green onions.
